hints.content: First, we need to find $4\dfrac34$ inches on the number line.

$4\dfrac34$ is after $4$ but before $5$.

[[☃ image 1]]

There are $4$ equal parts, or fourths, between each whole. We can use equivalent fractions to label each tick.

[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: A line plot that has, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 4 and 5. Between the labeled tick marks are three equally-spaced unlabeled tick marks. !
A line plot that has, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 4, 4 and one-fourth, 4 and one-half, 4 and three-fourths, and 5. The 4 and three-fourths tick mark is highlighted. !

hints.content:
Each dot represents one caterpillar.

So, we need to count all of the dots on the line plot that represent caterpillars that are $4\dfrac34$ inches long.

[[☃ image 1]]

There are $\blueE2$ dots that represent lengths that are $4\dfrac34$ inches.

options.alt: A line plot labeled Caterpillar lengths (inches) shows, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10. Three unlabeled tick marks appear between each labeled tick mark. Dots are plotted as follows: 2 dots above 4, 4 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 4, 2 dots above the third unlabeled tick mark after 4, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 5, 2 dots above 6, 3 dots above 7, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 8, and 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 9. The third unlabeled tick mark after 4 and 2 dots above it are highlighted. !

question.content:
The lengths of some caterpillars are shown below.  

[[☃ image 1]]

**How many caterpillar lengths measured $4\dfrac34$ inches?** 
 
[[☃ input-number 1]] caterpillars

options.alt: A line plot labeled Caterpillar lengths (inches) shows, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10. Three unlabeled tick marks appear between each labeled tick mark. Dots are plotted as follows: 2 dots above 4, 4 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 4, 2 dots above the third unlabeled tick mark after 4, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 5, 2 dots above 6, 3 dots above 7, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 8, and 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 9. !
